name: i forgot Jump
description:
i forgot Jump:: is our submission to GMTK jam 2018

It is a platformer without unlimited movement.

you must pick up pickups in order to move left, right and jump.

we ran out of time to make the duck levels but functionality exists

made by

Ben Fox

Jared Joyal

Michael Crouch

Controls:

D - Right

A - Left

Space - Jump

R - Reset level
